overview: Trouble brews when a rogue mafia member wastes a made man. In the wake of this devastating event, the mob boss is left unpleased, and stomachs are left empty. Member Bobby is enthused by the idea of vengeance, but the others are more interested in funny videos and getting their bellies filled. Will the members come to an agreement, get some sandwiches, and stop the rogue member's rain of terror? Or will the knock of god silence them all?
title: Shake & Bake Part II
